槮字的基本解释

槮
sēn
见“椮”。

槮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sēn］
［《廣韻》所今切，平侵，生。］
［《廣韻》楚簪切，平侵，初。］
“椮1”的繁体字。
树木长貌。
[②]［sǎn］
［《廣韻》桑感切，上感，心。］
“椮2”的繁体字。
(1)积柴水中用作捕鱼之具。
(2)引申为潜藏。

槮字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　槮； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页547第13
【唐韻】所今切【集韻】【韻會】蘇簪切，?音森。【說文】木長貌。【張衡·西京賦】橚?櫹槮。　又華葉落，莖獨立也。【宋玉·九辨】萷櫹槮之可哀兮。　又積柴水中以取魚曰槮。【爾雅·釋器】槮謂之涔。與罧同。　又【集韻】桑感切，音糝。式荏切，音審。斯荏切，音伈。義?同。　又【集韻】【韻會】?蘇遭切，音騷。木長也。【馬融·長笛賦】森槮柞樸。　又【集韻】師銜切，音杉。森槮，木長貌。　又【廣韻】疎錦切，音㾕。木實名也。　又【韻會】所斬切，音㺑。【博雅】取也。一曰執也。引《詩·鄭風·槮》執子之手兮。註：擥也。《詩》本从手。

槮字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
槮字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
槮
sēn
See "椮".
槮
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sēn]
["Guangyun" is cut today, flat invaded, and born. ]
["Guangyun" Chu hairpin cut, flat invasion, early. ]
"椮1" in traditional characters.
The trees look good.
[②]［sǎn］
["Guangyun" has a sense of mulberry, a sense of supremacy, and a heart. ]
"椮2" in traditional characters.
(1) The water used to accumulate firewood is used as a fishing gear.
(2) Extended to latent.

[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　槮; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 547 13
[Tang Yun] So Jin cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Su hairpin cut,? Yin Sen. [Said the text] Mu Changmei. [Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu] Xuan? Xuanfu.　The leaves are falling again, and the stems are independent. 【Song Yu·Nine Distinctions】Qiqiufu is sad.　Accumulate firewood in the water to get fish and say 槮. 【Erya·Release Device】槮 is called 涔. Same as 罧.　[Jiyun] Mulberry feels cut, sound grits. Style cut, sound review. Si Lianqie, sound 伈. Righteous? Same.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui]? Su Zuoqie, Yin Sao. Mu Chang also. [Ma Rong·Flute Fu] Mori Tuapu.　[Jiyun] The title of the teacher is cut, and the sound is fir. Sencha, wood looks long.　 [Guang Yun] Jiu Jin cut, sound 㾕. The name of Mu Shi is also.　[Yunhui] cut and cut, sound 㺑. [Bo Ya] Take it too. One is to hold on. Quoting "Poetry·Zheng Feng·槮" holding his hand. Note: Fu also. "Poetry" was originally from hand.
